Workshop on 3D Laser Scanning
=============================

by [webmaster](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/sazizul/ "Posts by webmaster")
 | Sep 17, 2020 | [Conference & Seminar](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/conference-seminar/)
, [event](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/event/)
, [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)
, [photo](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/photo/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/119515449_3621068467938533_468438628012146043_o-1080x675.jpg)

15 September 2020 â€“ Workshop on 3D Laser Scanning was held at Convention Hall, Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying. Research members from Universiti Sains Islam Malaysia, Universiti Malaysia Terengganu and Universiti Teknologi Mara were participated in this workshop to gain knowledge of 3D laser scanning historical artifacts. This one-day workshop was beneficial to the participants in the collaborative research grant, 3D Reconstruction of Historical Fragments Using Advanced Mathematical Approach.
